message:
SYSTEM: Presentacion_OEG_OPM_9-12-2010.pdf: Página 17
15
WEB N+1
Using OPM to model the metadata of the platform.
•OPMO as a reference ontology to model the evolution of the information in the 
platform.
•Use of resource centric vocabularies to model the specific artifacts 
•SIOC
•MPEG7
•GEO
•Layered model
•Allows interoperability with other resource centric vocabularies (and other 
provenance models too, thanks to the mapping effort).
speaker: SYSTEM
